title: Mario Forever ver 4 0-SH Team
description:
Mario Forever ver 4 0-SH Team

Super Mario 4 Mario Forever is really a classic Mario remake. 

Once again you strap on your wrench and hardhat and guide the chubby plumber through many skillfully made levels. The diversity of the levels is very impressive. You will have to get through levels ranging from underwater caverns to levels filled with hot lava. It includes many updates, enhancements, and bug fixes. In new version you&#039;ll find a level editor and new hidden map in save selector area. Mario Worker as level editor. Graphics layers in world 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and save room fixed. I&#039;ve fixed Collision checking for enemies in Human Labolatory World. New hidden map in save game room The Lost Map. Collision checking for Kuppa Troopa shell have been changed a little. A space key (skip level) from stage 7-4 have been removed. Non-material blocks in stage 1-1 have been fixed.
